author: Rappler.com
title: LIVE BLOG: 2017 PBA semifinals Game 5 - Ginebra vs Star Hotshots
text: LIVE BLOG: 2017 PBA semifinals Game 5 - Ginebra vs Star Hotshots Bookmark this page for live updates on Friday, February 17 starting at 7 pm! Published 3:49   3:49     Who will claim a twice-to-beat advantage in the best-of-7 PBA Philippine Cup semifinals series? Old rivals Barangay Ginebra and Star Hotshots will once again clash for Game 5 on Friday, February 17 at the Mall of Asia Arena. Can the Star Hotshots bounce back from two consecutive losses, or will Barangay Ginebra win a third straight game to take a 3-2 lead in the Manila Clasico series? Follow Rappler's coverage through the live blog starting at 7 pm! A Twitter List by rapplerdotcom
